paragraphs: Long ago, a strange gem was discovered in the Mines of Khuras. The gem was magnificent and flawless. For all its beauty, however, no one ever understood the power it contained. Nor did they realize that the mines were teeming with the stones.

We discovered that these gems could be used to power our corruption totems. We need more gems to support our efforts against the Wyrd Tree. Claim the mine and impress some people into service to collect more of these gems.
